summary: The AI Industry Prosperity Index scores 70/100, reflecting strong underlying growth despite GPU price corrections. Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments (Microsoft $50B, Google prioritizing AI, Meta $35-40B), driving bullish capex sentiment. However, H100/A100 rental prices have fallen ~30% from recent highs ($4.50→$3.14/hr), signaling temporary oversupply. This is offset by imminent innovation catalysts like GPT-5 (confirmed 2024 release) and Gemini 2.
